# 算法基础

# 二分查找

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	target := 10
	arr := []int{1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 9, 10, 11, 13, 15, 16}
	index := binarySearch(target, arr)
	fmt.Println(index)
	index2 := binarySearch2(target, arr, 0, len(arr)-1)
	fmt.Println(index2)
}

func binarySearch2(target int, arr []int, left, right int) int {
	mid := (left + right) / 2
	if target == arr[mid] {
		return mid
	}
	if left >= right {
		return -1
	}
	if target > arr[mid] {
		left = mid + 1
	} else {
		right = mid - 1
	}
	return binarySearch2(target, arr, left, right)
}

func binarySearch(target int, arr []int) int {
	left := 0
	right := len(arr) - 1
	for {
		mid := (left + right) / 2
		if target == arr[mid] {
			return mid
		}
		if left >= right {
			return -1
		}
		if target > arr[mid] {
			left = mid + 1
		} else {
			right = mid - 1
		}
	}
}
